snippet: The Mets are vying for a playoff spot after a World Series appearance while a dispute with Comcast is keeping the Yankees off nearly a million television screens....
abstract: Broadcasts of New York Mets games on SNY network through All-Star break drew average of 278,078 viewers, up 39 percent from same period year earlier; increase in viewership is attributable to team's surprising World Series run and prospect they could enter postseason again, their record notwithstanding.
lead_paragraph: The Mets are vying for a playoff spot after a World Series appearance while a dispute with Comcast is keeping the Yankees off nearly a million television screens.

headline.main: Mets’ On-Field Success and Yankees’ Off-Field Squabble Propel a Switch in Viewership
headline.print_headline: Success Lifts Mets’ TV Numbers as Cable Squabble Drags on Yanks’
